trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Flagstaff
There were no other sightings in Flagstaff on or around October 21st 2012
divs: sighting detailsme and my friend were driving from flagstaff to phoenix and saw a ufo. it was brighter and bigger than a star and was hovering for a bit, changed direction, then it went down towards the treetops in the forest. it did not look like a meteorite because it had no tail. it was a bright yellow\white color. the event lasted for approximately 3-5 seconds. we don't know where or if it landed. we were very curious to know exactly what it was and a bit shocked.
